elements.text:
You and your family are heading out of town for a few days and your partner asks you to double-check that all the appliances in your house are turned off before you leave. You had to rush to pack so didn't get to check everything. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: Even though I didn't get to fully check a second time before we all left, I remember that I have never left the appliances on when leaving the house before.
Even if I'm not 100% certain that the appliances are off, I can live with that.
I think about all the fun things my family and I will do on our trip.
I think about all of the horrible things that could happen in the house.
I think about how I noticed everything was turned off during the first check.
